text: Edward R. Hauser (August 29, 1916 - September 8, 2014) was an American animal scientist. He was professor and chairman of the Department of Meat and Animal Science at University of Wisconsin-Madison. Hauser was born in La Crosse, Wisconsin. Hauser died from natural causes in Fitchburg, Wisconsin, aged 98. ==References== Category:1916 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Scientists from Wisconsin Category:Academics from Wisconsin
title: Edward R. Hauser
